version_description:
Happy Holidays! Celebrate with the new free Interval Pack and more!

- New free Interval Pack
- 9x9 Mania is now free
- 11x11 and 12x12 Mania are now available for purchase or included with Unlock All Packs
- Various minor fixes and improvements

Enjoy!

Enjoy!

Celebrate Flow Free's 5th birthday with this huge update!
New free packs with fun new twists and more!

- New free packs! Courtyard and Extreme Pack 2
- 15x15 Mania is now available for purchase or included with Unlock All Packs
- New free Dark Matter color theme to celebrate the release of Flow Free: Warps!
- Various minor fixes and improvements

Enjoy!

Happy Holidays!

Celebrate with two new free packs, and improved Undo support!

- New Tower Pack
- New Courtyard Spin Pack with walls
- Jumbo Courtyard and Extreme Rainbow Pack are now available for purchase or included with Unlock All Packs
- New and improved Undo button to easily correct mistakes
- Various minor fixes and improvements.

Enjoy!
